pullrequest.title: Build examples and run one example on pipelines

content.raw:
There are still 7 cppcheck errors:

~~~
./src/RotationSplinePrivate.hh:22:  Found C++ system header after other header. Should be: RotationSplinePrivate.h, c system, c++ system, other.  [build/include_order] [4]
./src/SplinePrivate.cc:28:  Redundant blank line at the start of a code block should be deleted.  [whitespace/blank_line] [2]
./src/SplinePrivate.cc:155:  Redundant blank line at the end of a code block should be deleted.  [whitespace/blank_line] [3]
./include/ignition/math/Temperature.hh:24:  Found C++ system header after other header. Should be: Temperature.h, c system, c++ system, other.  [build/include_order] [4]
./include/ignition/math/MassMatrix3.hh:29:  Found C++ system header after other header. Should be: MassMatrix3.h, c system, c++ system, other.  [build/include_order] [4]
./include/ignition/math/Inertial.hh:22:  Found C++ system header after other header. Should be: Inertial.h, c system, c++ system, other.  [build/include_order] [4]
./include/ignition/math/Helpers.hh:30:  Found C++ system header after other header. Should be: Helpers.h, c system, c++ system, other.  [build/include_order] [4]
~~~
